p: Methods: We gave an anonymous questionnaire to maternity staff to assess baseline knowledge. This tested respondent’s on the diagnostic criteria for systemic inflammatory response syndrome (SIRS), sepsis, severe sepsis and their knowledge of the ‘Sepsis Six’ treatment bundle for severe sepsis [1]. Our interventions consisted of 1:1 teaching and the provision of an information poster. A re-audit was performed in the same units a week later.
